docs.lead_paragraph: The City Club gave over its lunch hour yesterday afternoon to a luncheon for Victor Berger, the Socialist Congressman of Milwaukee. It was followed by a discussion, in which Mr. Berger took the lead, of Socialistic ideals as applied to city government.

headline.main: BERGER CALLED ON TO EXPLAIN DEFEAT; Socialists Were Beaten in His Town Because of Catholic Church's Opposition, He Says.
